coreAtributes.name: Tactical Shin Guards
coreAtributes.description: A pair of hevay fabric shin guards reinforced with metal.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your tactical shin guards.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull off [npc.name]'s tactical shin guards.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s tactical shin guards and roughly pull them off [npc.her] legs.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls your tactical shin guards off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your tactical shin guards and roughly pulls them off your legs.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s tactical shin guards and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] legs.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the tactical shin guards.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s tactical shin guards on [npc.her] legs.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the tactical shin guards on [npc.her] legs.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] put on the tactical shin guards.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your tactical shin guards on your legs.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the tactical shin guards on your legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s tactical shin guards on their legs.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s tactical shin guards and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] legs.
